head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths VAN ESS, MARGARET EGAN

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths VAN ESS, MARGARET EGAN

block.p: VAN ESS-Margaret Egan suddenly on Sept. 7, 2000 of Plandome. Beloved wife of Greg. Cherished daughter of Thomas Sr. and Catherine. Loving sister of Thomas and William. In repose at the Fairchild Funeral Chapel, 1570 Northern Boulevard, Manhasset, Saturday 7-9PM and Sunday 3-5 & 7-9PM. Funeral Mass on Monday 10 AM, St. Mary's R.C. Church, Manhasset. Entombment Calvary Cemetery. Donations may be made to Ovarian Cancer Research Fund, 1 Penn Plaza, Suite 1610, New York, NY 10119-0165.
